For hotel:lady/lady solitaire (travel category)dbs wwmc for onlineuob ppv for mobile contactlessuob visa signature for local conractless (min 1k in sgd)/ overseas (min S$1k in foreIgn currency)

It seems you need an additional card. The UOB preferred platinum visa appears to be what you are describing in that it gives 4mpd for mobile contactless/selected online for your "catch all" retail spending. PPV doesn't have min spend so it is ideal for your scenario since you are already heavily in the uob ecosystem for miles pooling
This I different from you.Travel and online shopping I use dbs woman card.Contactless.  Citi rewards with amazeHotel. Amex platinum card or citi premier miles.
1 more to add. Local retail. Ocbc rewards card.
Ok thanks bros. I go look harder at uob preferred platinum.
Yes. And it’s based on posted date. So do avoid last few days of the month.
